alert.note: Alert for Avoyelles; Rapides (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 01 at 5:30PM CDT by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northeastern Rapides and northwestern Avoyelles Parishes through 600 PM CDT... At 530 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms extending from near Alexandria to near Echo. Movement was northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Alexandria, Pineville, Effie, Ball, Deville, Libuse, Echo, Brouillette, Esler Regional Airport, Kingsville, Poland, Kolin, Centerpoint, Ruby, Holloway, Paradise and Tioga. This includes Interstate 49 between mile markers 77 and 85. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
